name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Beef strips, mushrooms, onions, garlic, sour cream, beef broth, mustard

name: Steak Plate
description: Two tender steak piece marinated with olive oil and fresh garlic, grilled to perfection. Served with roasted potatoes that are crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, with a touch of ketchup for extra flavor.

name: Shawarma
description: Juicy meat slices marinated with garlic, olive oil, and special spices, slowly roasted to perfection. Served with warm pita bread, pickles, and a drizzle of creamy tahini sauce for an authentic taste

name: Dolma
description: grape leaves, rice, meat, pine nuts, onions, spices

name: Stuffed Grape Leaves
description: Delicate grape leaves rolled and stuffed with rice, herbs, and a touch of lemon for a refreshing taste.

name: Kabsa
description: Rice, chicken, spices, tomatoes, onions, carrots, green peppers

name: Koshari
description: Rice, lentils, pasta, fried onions, tomato sauce, chickpeas

name: Fried Chicken
description: Chicken pieces, flour, eggs, breadcrumbs, spices

name: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
description: Tender cabbage leaves filled with seasoned rice and spices, slow-cooked in a savory tomato sauce.
